translations: v．引诱，诱骗：用诱饵或计谋引诱某人或动物进入陷阱或危险的境地。
· The hunters decoyed the ducks into the trap.
猎人诱骗鸭子进入陷阱。

sentences.sentence: He was decoyed by a false message (into entering enemy territory).
sentences.translation: 他被假情报诱骗(进入敌区)。

sentences.sentence: Strange to say, what delight we married people have to see these poor fools decoyed into our condition.
sentences.translation: 已婚之人看到那些可怜的傻瓜又经不住诱惑走进婚姻的围城，却感到心中暗喜，这说明真不可思议。
